title: Integration of Passive and Mechanical Systems

questions.question: What is the primary goal of integrating passive and mechanical cooling systems?
choices: To optimize thermal comfort while minimizing energy use
To eliminate the need for windows
questions.answer: To optimize thermal comfort while minimizing energy use

questions.answer: The outdoor temperature at which the system transitions from natural ventilation to mechanical cooling
